newsitem.title: JAPAN: Chuo Paperboard rises on share allocation.
newsitem.headline: Chuo Paperboard rises on share allocation.

text.p: Shares in Chuo Paperboard Co Ltd jumped on Tuesday afternoon, helped by its announcement on Monday that it will issue three million new shares in a third-party allocation to Itochu Corp and an Itochu unit, traders said.
The share price was up 34 yen at 367 yen at 0430 GMT, the second largest percentage gainer on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange. Volume was 181,000 shares.
Chuo Paperboard's decision to issue new shares through a third-party allocation eased market worries over financing for the firm, traders said.
In October, the company said it set aside loan loss reserves of 12.42 billion yen for the half year to September 30, the first half of the 1996/97 business year.
